title: Knowledge-Based Social Studies Curriculum Design: An Experiential Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Science Concepts and Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in a technology-constrained environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Apply and analyze five core theoretical frameworks explaining causal relationships in social phenomena
Utilize learned knowledge to solve at least three real-world problems through case studies
Implement social studies knowledge acquired from team-based projects into a 15-minute digital storytelling presentation

resources: Smartphone-compatible collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Docs mobile version)
Social studies open educational resources (OER) PDF materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
